title: For Everyone
detail_text: <:th_ch0003/>Dia-san, I brought the book you asked for.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0104/>Thank you, Kotori-san. Ruby was lamenting that she couldn’t get this “World’s Dresses: The Sewing Book” anywhere she went.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0003/>Fufu, I’ve read it so much, so I’ll be glad if Ruby-chan likes it.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0109/>I’m sure she will.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0003/>....Hey, Dia-san, you look a bit tired.... Are you okay?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0104/>Eh, really? Well, the student council has been busy with various things since the new year. Maybe that’s why.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0003/>Despite being so busy, you still think about Ruby-chan, huh? You’re really a wonderful big sister, Dia-san.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0104/>T-, that’s not....<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0003/>It’s incredible how you properly care for the student council, the club, and your family. Pat pat.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0104/>T-, this is really embarrassing, Kotori-san~!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
